message.update-model-tips: Give your model an alias to make it easier to identify.
message.delete-model-warning:
Deleted model cannot be recovered.
Do you still want to proceed?
message.alias-tips: Alias helps you identify your model
message.api-key-tips: The key for your model's API
message.endpoint-tips: The endpoint of your model's API
message.endpoint-tips-azure: The endpoint of your model's API. Its format usually takes the form "https://{your-resource-name}.openai.azure.com".
message.api-version-tips: The version of your model's API. It usually follows the YYYY-MM-DD format.
message.deployment-id-tips: The deployment name of your model's API
message.model-tips: The model type of your model's API
